messages.subject: SCA in Eugene, was Re: Welcome Back, Sandra
messages.msgSnippet: ... Anyone ... month?? ... so ... Hi Cindy, the weather in Eugene in June is usually beautiful and about 80 degrees but sometimes we do still get some rain in
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Cindy Ferguson <crma@i...> wrote:
> So now I have to sew more garb and get organized for camping.
Anyone
> have any idea what weather we will have in Eugene, OR in about one
month??
> (I am also enjoying *every* minute of it too! We do mundane camping
so
> it's a matter of organizing that for an SCA event.)


Hi Cindy, the weather in Eugene in June is usually beautiful and
about 80 degrees but sometimes we do still get some rain in June, so
you never know. July is usually high-80's and sunny (though last year
we did have a couple of cooler rainy days in the first week of July).
May I ask what event you're coming here for? We've never gone to an
SCA event, but I think my son would really like it so I'd be
interested in finding out more. You can email me at
robinc@... if you want to discuss it off-list.


Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) "A bee is pollinating my eye"
and Asa (10/5/99) "Asa eat buggy"
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
